name: exyconn-call-center
description: Exyconn AI-Powered Call Center - Desktop App

scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "cd ui && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:2001 && electron ."
scripts.electron:build: cd ui && npm run build && cd .. && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && electron-builder
scripts.postinstall: cd ui && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
